extendedInfo.description: Dr. Gary Brownâs (more info @ drbrownsapps.com)  Autism DX/Treatment is a short informational applet that is designed to help you find the proper diagnosis and treatment for your child who is on the Autism spectrum. This app contains useful and easy to understand information that can help both you and your child. It is filled with links to ABA approved resources such as books and other apps, including our DTT Discrete Trial Training apps, and has links to other apps that we use and test everyday at our clinic. This app also contains warnings for unproven treatments to watch out for. This app is currently available in English/Simplified Chinese, but other languages will be added soon. Be sure to check out Dr. Brownâs other apps: * Autism Colors * Autism/DTT Shapes Please check the app's website for more information about Autism, ABA and DTT.
